name: Unscheduled Maintenance
description:
A game made for college, with the theme Escape Room. You are stuck on a ship destined to blow up in 3 minutes, and you need to make your way to the exit, you have access to terminals that allow you Actual access to the games code to find your way out.

This also technically allows you to do whatever you want to do as you will have full access to the code, but you can also just use it to win.

The coding puzzles are quite easy anyone should be able to do them. But its also possible to make it out without the coding.

Controls:

WASD to walk

E to interact with terminals ect

ESC to get out of terminals
